name: Relentless Pursuit
originalText: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

rulings.text: While resolving Relentless Pursuit, you could put no cards, a creature card, a land card, or a creature card and a land card into your hand.
